name: SP500 Hybrid Volume Breakout Momentum
description: Trades long-only breakouts in S&P 500 constituents. A position is opened when price closes above the 22-day high, daily volume is ≥130 % of its 22-day average and RSI(14) > 60, utilising the Hybrid Breakout Volume Strategy engine. Exits occur on a 15 % trailing stop or a close below the 10-day EMA. Each trade deploys 2 % of equity with up to five simultaneous positions, targeting moderately aggressive growth.
